attributes.name: horizontal
attributes.description: Renders the collapse horizontally when true and vertically otherwise

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: Set opened to true to show the collapse element and to false to hide it.

attributes.name: noAnimation
attributes.description: Set noAnimation to true to disable animations.

properties.name: horizontal
properties.description: Renders the collapse horizontally when true and vertically otherwise

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Set opened to true to show the collapse element and to false to hide it.

properties.name: noAnimation
properties.description: Set noAnimation to true to disable animations.

events.name: resize
events.description: Dispatched when the element should re-layout itself.
